command.name: attach
command.help: Attach to a running container

command.name: build
command.help: Build an image from a Dockerfile

command.name: commit
command.help: Create a new image from a container's changes

command.name: cp
command.help: Copy files/folders between a container and the local filesystem

command.name: create
command.help: Create a new container

command.name: deploy
command.help: Create and update a stack from a Distributed Application Bundle (DAB)

command.name: diff
command.help: Inspect changes on a container's filesystem

command.name: events
command.help: Get real time events from the server

command.name: exec
command.help: Run a command in a running container

command.name: export
command.help: Export a container's filesystem as a tar archive

command.name: history
command.help: Show the history of an image

command.name: images
command.help: List images

command.name: import
command.help: Import the contents from a tarball to create a filesystem image

command.name: info
command.help: Display system-wide information

command.name: inspect
command.help: Return low-level information on a container, image or task

command.name: kill
command.help: Kill one or more running containers

command.name: load
command.help: Load an image from a tar archive or STDIN

command.name: login
command.help: Log in to a Docker registry.

command.name: logout
command.help: Log out from a Docker registry.

command.name: logs
command.help: Fetch the logs of a container

command.name: network
command.help: Manage Docker networks

command.name: node
command.help: Manage Docker Swarm nodes

command.name: pause
command.help: Pause all processes within one or more containers

command.name: plugin
command.help: Manage Docker plugins

command.name: port
command.help: List port mappings or a specific mapping for the container

command.name: ps
command.help: List containers

command.name: pull
command.help: Pull an image or a repository from a registry

command.name: push
command.help: Push an image or a repository to a registry

command.name: rename
command.help: Rename a container

command.name: restart
command.help: Restart a container

command.name: rm
command.help: Remove one or more containers

command.name: rmi
command.help: Remove one or more images

command.name: run
command.help: Run a command in a new container

command.name: save
command.help: Save one or more images to a tar archive (streamed to STDOUT by default)

command.name: search
command.help: Search the Docker Hub for images

command.name: service
command.help: Manage Docker services

command.name: stack
command.help: Manage Docker stacks

command.name: start
command.help: Start one or more stopped containers

command.name: stats
command.help: Display a live stream of container(s) resource usage statistics

command.name: stop
command.help: Stop one or more running containers

command.name: swarm
command.help: Manage Docker Swarm

command.name: tag
command.help: Tag an image into a repository

command.name: top
command.help: Display the running processes of a container

command.name: unpause
command.help: Unpause all processes within one or more containers

command.name: update
command.help: Update configuration of one or more containers

command.name: version
command.help: Show the Docker version information

command.name: volume
command.help: Manage Docker volumes

command.name: wait
command.help: Block until a container stops, then print its exit code
